item.title: 欧洲央行行长西波罗内告诉 Corriere：对通胀的忧虑可能有害
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波罗内（Piero Cipollone）在接受《晚邮报》采访时说，过度担忧未来可能出现的通胀冲击会对经济造成损害。【原文：Excessive concern about possible future inflation shocks can be harmful to the economy, European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone told Corriere della Sera in an interview.】

item.title: 吉尔兹债券收益率飙升，对特鲁斯续集的担忧也随之而来
item.description:
全球债券市场的变动已经蒸发了英国的预算缓冲，使得削减开支的可能性更大。【原文：

The global move in bonds has already vaporized the UK’s budget buffer, making spending cuts even more likely.

】

item.title: 英国债券动荡唤起人们对 1976 年债务危机的记忆
item.description: 英国最近的债券动荡与 2022 年的利兹-特拉斯小型预算案（Liz Truss mini-budget debacle）相提并论，但将其与 20 世纪 70 年代的债务危机相提并论可能更为恰当。【原文：Britain’s latest bond turmoil has drawn comparisons with the Liz Truss mini-budget debacle of 2022 but a parallel with the debt crisis of the 1970s might be more apt.】

item.title: 希腊科佩卢佐预计 2030 年开始与埃及电力联网
item.description: 希腊 Copelouzos 集团负责该项目的高管表示，该集团正在加快开发价值 42 亿欧元（43 亿美元）的与埃及的电力连接项目，希望明年能做出最终投资决定，并于 2030 年启动该项目。【原文：Greece’s Copelouzos Group is speeding up development of its €4.2 billion ($4.3 billion) power link with Egypt, looking to reach a final investment decision next year and its startup in 2030, the executive in charge of the project said.】

item.title: 麦格理称，印尼镍矿开采可能使全球供应量减少 35
item.description: 据麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）称，印尼镍矿产量的潜在削减可能会使全球三分之一以上的供应量退出市场，从而给价格带来巨大的上行风险。【原文：Potential cuts to Indonesian nickel mine output could remove more than a third of global supply from the market, according to Macquarie Group Ltd., presenting a significant upside risk to prices.】

item.title: 拉菲兹称马来西亚汽油补贴改革已进入最后阶段
item.description: 马来西亚经济部即将向内阁提交一份关于收入分类的新提案，该提案将允许马来西亚停止向最富有的 15%的人提供汽油补贴。【原文：Malaysia’s economy ministry is close to presenting to the cabinet a new proposal on income classification that would allow the nation to end petrol subsidies for the wealthiest 15%.】

item.title: 中国疾病控制机构检测到新的麻风腮病菌群
item.description: 世界卫生组织去年宣布非洲疫情为新的全球紧急卫生事件后，该病原体蔓延到了更多地区。【原文：China has detected the new mutated strain of the mpox virus, as the pathogen spreads to more geographies after the World Health Organization declared the outbreak in Africa a new global health emergency last year.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟外国补贴法构成贸易壁垒
item.description: 中国称，欧盟为保护本国公司免受外国补贴而采取的措施是贸易和投资障碍，这是双方持续贸易争端中的最新冲突。【原文：China said the European Union’s measures to shield its companies from foreign subsidies are a barrier to trade and investment, marking the latest clash in the ongoing trade dispute between the two sides.】

item.title: FTX 质疑向前雇员出售欧盟资产的交易是否已完成
item.description: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）的前加密货币企业欧洲分部归谁所有的问题似乎已经尘埃落定：总部位于迪拜的背包交易所（Backpack Exchange）表示，经过几个月的争论，它已经收购了 FTX EU。【原文：The question of who owns the European unit of Sam Bankman-Fried’s former crypto enterprise appeared to be settled: Dubai-based Backpack Exchange said it had purchased FTX EU after months of wrangling.】

item.title: 汇丰银行分析师认为香港上市中资股有 21% 的上涨空间
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）转而看好在香港上市的中国股票，称它们是中国大陆 "更有利的政策言论 "和国内经济更好前景的受益者。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is turning bullish on Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong, touting them as beneficiaries of more “favorable policy rhetoric” in mainland China and a better outlook for the domestic economy.】

item.title: 前谷歌首席执行官埃里克-施密特据说是相对论太空公司的投资者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，谷歌前首席执行官埃里克-施密特（Eric Schmidt）已对3D打印火箭制造商Relativity Space Inc.公司进行了重大投资。【原文：Eric Schmidt, the former chief executive officer of Google, has made a significant investment in 3D-printed rocket maker Relativity Space Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 收益季来临，印度投资者关注 TCS 增长前景
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 爱迪生公司审查伊顿致命火灾起火点附近的运营情况
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司表示，帕萨迪纳附近致命的伊顿大火始于该公司的服务区，在大火焚烧洛杉矶大片地区之际，该公司正在对这一事件进行审查。【原文：Edison International said the deadly Eaton fire near Pasadena started in its service area and the utility-owner is conducting a review of the event, as blazes scorch vast areas of Los Angeles.】

item.title: 中国太阳能自律引发关键材料价格上涨
item.description: 随着行业主导的解决供应过剩问题的努力初见成效，中国太阳能电池板用多晶硅的价格开始走高。【原文：Chinese prices of polysilicon used in solar panels have turned higher, as industry-led efforts to solve oversupply begin to bear fruit.】

item.title: 即使采取了刺激措施，中国的通胀率仍接近零点
item.description: 中国的消费通胀率进一步趋于零，连续第四个月下降，这使政府通过向经济注入刺激措施来拉动需求的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：China’s consumer inflation weakened further toward zero, decelerating for a fourth straight month in a setback for government efforts to drive up demand by injecting stimulus into the economy.】

item.title: 欧洲企业称中国 "本土化 "压力增加成本
item.description: 一个成员包括许多欧洲大陆最大公司的商业团体称，一些欧洲公司正在牺牲效率，丧失其全球优势，因为它们在中国的业务被围墙隔开，面临着更多本地化生产的压力。【原文：Some European firms are sacrificing efficiency and losing their global edge as they wall off their operations in China and come under pressure to produce more locally, according to a business group whose members include many of the continent’s biggest companies.】

item.title: 中国加大对人民币的支持力度，港币发行量创历史新高
item.description: 中国扩大了对陷入困境的人民币的支持，计划在香港市场发行创纪录数量的钞票，以增加海外对人民币的需求。【原文：China expanded its support for the beleaguered yuan with a plan to issue a record amount of bills in the Hong Kong market to add demand for the currency overseas.】

item.title: 印度卢比套期保值成本因看跌押注而创下 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 印度资产的外汇风险对冲成本升至两年多来的最高点，因为人们越来越多地押注印度政府正在放松对卢比的铁腕控制。【原文：The cost to hedge foreign-exchange risk in Indian assets rose to the highest in more than two years as bets mount that authorities are easing their iron grip on the rupee.】

item.title: 澳大利亚零售销售额令人失望，凸显价格压力
item.description: 澳大利亚 11 月份零售额的增长速度低于预期，原因是尽管政府提供了能源和房租退税，而且预计今年将降息，但消费者对预算仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Australian retail sales rose slower than expected in November as consumers remain cautious about their budgets despite energy and rent rebates from the government and expectations of interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 信贷公司 SC Lowy 启动新基金，专注于私人债务领域
item.description: 信贷投资者 SC Lowy Financial HK Ltd. 将更多地转向私人信贷，并关闭一只专注于公共证券的基金，以期在新兴资产类别中抓住更多机会。【原文：Credit investor SC Lowy Financial HK Ltd. will pivot more toward private credit and close a fund focused on public securities, in a bid to seize more opportunities in the burgeoning asset class.】

item.title: 美国码头工人与雇主达成避免罢工的临时协议
item.description: 美国码头工人工会与一批远洋承运商和码头运营商就新的劳动合同达成了临时协议，如果获得批准，将避免东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸港口下周关闭。【原文：A US dockworkers union reached a tentative deal on a new labor contract with a group of ocean carriers and terminal operators that, if ratified would avoid a shutdown of East and Gulf coast ports next week.】

item.title: 美国数据或影响加息路径 黄金维持两日涨势
item.description: 在本周晚些时候公布关键就业数据之前，交易员们对美联储的宽松政策前景进行了思考，因此黄金在连续两日上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Gold steadied after a two-day advance as traders mulled the outlook for the Federal Reserve’s easing path ahead of key jobs figures due later this week.】

item.title: 芯片设计公司 Arm 考虑收购安培计算公司
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，软银集团公司及其控股公司 Arm Holdings Plc 正在探讨收购 Ampere Computing LLC 的交易。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. and its majority-owned Arm Holdings Plc are exploring a deal for Ampere Computing LLC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报告：爱尔兰房屋要价创 2022 年以来最高涨幅
item.description: 一份报告显示，爱尔兰住宅的售价在最后一个季度出现了自2022年6月以来的最高涨幅，交易活动接近爱尔兰凯尔特虎增长时期的水平。【原文：Asking prices for Irish homes rose in the final quarter at the highest rate since June 2022, according to a report, as transaction activity nears levels seen during Ireland’s Celtic tiger growth era.】

item.title: 企业为增税做准备，招聘人数急剧下降
item.description: 英国央行密切关注的一项调查显示，英国企业的招聘速度创下了 16 个月以来的最快速度，因为企业管理者们都在为工党的增税政策做准备。【原文：Hiring by British businesses fell at its fastest pace in 16 months as managers brace for Labour’s tax hikes, according to a survey closely watched by the Bank of England.】

item.title: 新兴亚洲货币将失去对冲成本的支持
item.description: 美元投资者在亚洲投资的套期保值成本将从两年来的高点回落，这一变化可能导致对该地区货币的支持减少。【原文：The cost of hedging Asian investments for dollar-funded investors is set to drop from a two-year high, a shift that could lead to reduced support for the region’s currencies.】

item.title: 银行家称日本 2,300 亿美元的并购热潮将更猛烈
item.description: 在去年超过 2300 亿美元的并购交易之后，日本的交易商预计 2025 年将更加繁忙，这主要得益于企业对业务扩张态度的转变。【原文：Japan’s dealmakers are expecting a busier 2025 after more than $230 billion in mergers and acquisitions last year, underpinned by companies’ changing attitudes around business expansion.】

item.title: 泰国央行驳斥采取措施刺激通胀的要求
item.description: 泰国中央银行的一位高级官员表示，在不确定性不断增加的情况下，该行将货币政策的重点放在确保金融稳定和经济增长上，因此对抑制通货膨胀的前景感到满意。【原文：Thailand’s central bank is comfortable with the outlook for subdued inflation as it focuses the monetary policy to ensure financial stability and economic growth amid rising uncertainties, a senior official said.】

item.title: 日本基本工资创 32 年最大增幅，加息前景看好
item.description: 日本工人的基本工资增长幅度为 32 年来最大，这表明积极的经济周期正在形成，并使央行在近期继续加息。【原文：Japanese workers’ base salaries grew the most in 32 years, offering signs that a positive economic cycle is emerging and keeping the central bank on track for near-term additional rate hikes.】

item.title: 市场出现收紧迹象，石油市场在震荡后趋于平稳
item.description: 在经历了一个波动的交易时段后，石油市场趋于稳定，因为交易商评估了市场收紧的迹象，这些迹象支撑了石油在新的一年里的涨势。【原文：Oil steadied after a volatile session, as traders assessed signs of a tightening market that have supported gains in the new year.】
